name: Rise of John
description:
John & his grandfather is out there to protect their city. They are fighting against an army of aliens. Can they save their city.

A game where you fight as John & defeat the aliens. Jump, shoot, drop power balls & plan of how to defeat the aliens.

Save your city by shooting down the invading enemies. A fun game where you protect your city by shooting down the aliens. A single man against a huge army of aliens. Shoot, jump, run or seek . Defend the city.
